description: Sediment pollution from contributing sources in Bay watershed, tons per year. 1985, 2007, and 2009 - 2012 progress; 2017 and 2025 target loads. Target loads for sediment were not broken out to a scale finer than major basin.  Data source: EPA Phase 5.3.2 Watershed Model.

name: Chesapeake Bay Pollution Loads - Sediment
